title: NumberFormatException on latest master
body:
Stacktrace:
com.airbnb.lottie, PID: 3932
    java.lang.RuntimeException: An error occured while executing doInBackground()
        at android.os.AsyncTask$3.done(AsyncTask.java:300)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.finishCompletion(FutureTask.java:355)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.setException(FutureTask.java:222)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:242)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1112)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:587)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:818)
     Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: 32.0000610351562
        at android.util.JsonReader.nextInt(JsonReader.java:522)
        at com.airbnb.lottie.parser.FontCharacterParser.parse(FontCharacterParser.java:33)
        at com.airbnb.lottie.parser.LottieCompositionParser.parseChars(LottieCompositionParser.java:201)
        at com.airbnb.lottie.parser.LottieCompositionParser.parse(LottieCompositionParser.java:81)
        at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieComposition$Factory.fromJsonSync(LottieComposition.java:276)
        at com.airbnb.lottie.parser.AsyncCompositionLoader.doInBackground(AsyncCompositionLoader.java:22)
        at com.airbnb.lottie.parser.AsyncCompositionLoader.doInBackground(AsyncCompositionLoader.java:12)
        at android.os.AsyncTask$2.call(AsyncTask.java:288)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:237)



When I changed the number from 32.0000610351562 to 32 (and a few other Floats in json) the animation is working (althogh not as desired as a lot of things have changed).

One more thing is that same file works on iOS but fails on Android.
